name: Skiptrace: When Jackie Met Johnny
detailed_description: Go behind the scenes and inside the hilarious fun of making SKIPTRACE, the first collaboration between Jackie Chan and Johnny Knoxville.  From comedy to stunts, the dynamic duo discuss their first meting , working on stunts and the comedy beats in the film.  Jackie and Johnny sit side by side for this hilarious exploration.
about_the_game: Go behind the scenes and inside the hilarious fun of making SKIPTRACE, the first collaboration between Jackie Chan and Johnny Knoxville.  From comedy to stunts, the dynamic duo discuss their first meting , working on stunts and the comedy beats in the film.  Jackie and Johnny sit side by side for this hilarious exploration.
